title: I cri :(
body:
Ekko is getting a new skin and zed gets no love.
I cri

Even a new champion gets one before zed.

k bye

replies.body:
Zed did get a skin, SKT T1 Zed, if you want zed to get a new skin before every new champion does, he's gunna have a bucketload of skins and i somehow don't think thats gunna happen.

although personally i would like zed to get a skin, PROJECT: Zed would be my preference or a bilgewater skin to make the reference to pirates vs ninjas (although if he does get a skin i will have to not play for that week because i hate vsing zeds)
and i do think its weird how Zed's chroma pack is one of the best chroma's of all and yet they dont release it.

Somebody's been looking at pbe XD ding on the project zed

Edit: oh this is 6 days old in that case you guessed right :)

I was so happy when they mentioned project zed.
Note: SKT1 ZED is not a skin in my opinion.
It was not riot's choice to make the skin it was a MUST since skt won the champuionship.
